abstract: Solheim Cup official Suzann Pettersen apologizes for disputed call on 17th hole that penalized American rookie Alison Lee.
lead_paragraph: Pettersen, of Norway, apologized for making a disputed call that left United States players fuming before their memorable victory in the Solheim Cup over the weekend.
snippet: Pettersen, of Norway, apologized for making a disputed call that left United States players fuming before their memorable victory in the Solheim Cup over the weekend.
